meanings.definition: The quality or state of being spaced out or distracted.
meanings.sent1: Her spaciness in class made it hard for her to focus on the lesson.
meanings.sent2: His spaciness at work often led to mistakes in his tasks.
meanings.sent3: Despite her spaciness, she managed to complete the project on time.
meanings.sent4: The spaciness of his mind was like a fog that clouded his thoughts.
meanings.sent5: The spaciness of the room created a dreamy atmosphere.

meanings.definition: A feeling of being disconnected from reality.
meanings.sent1: The spaciness she felt after the accident made everything seem unreal.
meanings.sent2: His spaciness during the movie made him feel like he was in a different world.
meanings.sent3: The spaciness of the situation made her question if it was all a dream.
meanings.sent4: Her spaciness was like floating in a bubble away from the real world.
meanings.sent5: The spaciness of the moment was like being in a bubble of unreality.

meanings.definition: A tendency to be absent-minded or forgetful.
meanings.sent1: His spaciness often caused him to forget where he put his keys.
meanings.sent2: The spaciness of her mind led her to miss important appointments.
meanings.sent3: Despite his spaciness, he managed to remember her birthday.
meanings.sent4: Her spaciness was like a cloud that made memories hard to grasp.
meanings.sent5: The spaciness of his thoughts made it challenging to focus on tasks.
